action.args: KARKAT: OK. ROSE: Change your mind this soon? KARKAT: JUST GIVE ME A SECOND TO DOUBLE-CHECK WITH MY CONSCIENCE. @! Sit through psychotherapy session?
@karkat_talk KARKAT: YEAH, NEVERMIND. STILL TURNING THAT DOWN. @rose_coytalk ROSE: Very well. I’ll still be around if you ever change your mind.
